sentences.english: That way, if we ever break up, I can use it again.
sentences.chinese: 这样，如果我们闹崩了，我还可以再用到它。

sentences.english: The environmental effects caused by the accumulation directly and indirectly is also discussed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 论文还就崩滑堰塞成湖后的环境效应进行了讨论。

sentences.english: There was an old Stupa which was damaged with brambles and grass.
sentences.chinese: 于彼园中有古朽塔摧坏崩倒荆棘掩庭蔓草封户。

sentences.english: Strong activation of glue makes the sole tight and not easy to fall off or broken.
sentences.chinese: 胶水活化性强，使大底紧密贴合，不虞脱落或裂崩。
